title: New: Thom Yorke/Four Tet/Burial Collaboration
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/thom-yorke-four-tet-900x596.jpg "thom-yorke-four-tet")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/?attachment_id=5353)

Earlier this afternoon **Four Tet** dropped his latest collaboration, this time with **Thom Yorke** and **Burial**, on the radio station ‘**Rinse PM**’ during a session with **Floating Points**. Two tunes were premiered “Ego” and “Mirror”. They’re mellow, dreamy and to be honest kind of what you’d expect from a collaboration with such artists. Check out the two tunes bellow.
